texto: 7.10.2 Benefits In addition to presenting the data in a visible form to the user, control charts facilitate the appropriate response to process variation. They help the user to distinguish the random variation that is inherent in a stable process, from variation that can be due to “assignable causes” (i.e. one to which a specific cause can be assigned) and whose timely detection and correction can help to improve the process.
